snippet: The group posted a list of names, photos and addresses of 100 service members who they said had participated in efforts to defeat the militant group.
abstract: Islamic State posts online list of names, photos and addresses of 100 American service members they are targeting for death because of their participation in military efforts to defeat militant group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and HELENE COOPER

lead_paragraph: The group posted a list of names, photos and addresses of 100 service members who they said had participated in efforts to defeat the militant group.

headline.main: ISIS Urges Sympathizers to Kill U.S. Service Members It Identifies on Website
headline.print_headline: Naming U.S. Service Members, ISIS Asks They Be Killed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
